data.text: @Too_Big_To_Fail @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating As of now, I doubt this outcome. I certainly doubt 100%, though life *is* a terminal condition, and I expect to find out all about that without exerting any further worry on the subject.
@Too_Big_To_Fail @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating Maybe. Time will tell. HPV causes cancer in some people eventually, so who knows.

@PaddlerPoet @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating Right, which is really my concern with COVID's mortality rate on a 7-10 year time horizon -- it causes damage to cardiac muscles and alveoli now, which in a few years turn in to COPD and congestive heart failure, and a few years later that kills you.
@Too_Big_To_Fail @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating And it's worth noting that HIV does not kill people by itself. Opportunistic secondary infections do.
@Too_Big_To_Fail @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating They work by entirely different means. They're entirely different viruses. This is a completely false analogy.
@Too_Big_To_Fail @PaddlerPoet @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating For one thing, SARS2 is not a retrovirus…  it doesn’t integrate itself into your DNA.

@PaddlerPoet @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating ... would put us in about 1983. Very nearly -- perhaps entirely -- every single person who was infected with HIV by 1983 died of the disease within 10 years. Absent evidence to the contrary, I don't see why we should expect anything different from COVID-19.

@PaddlerPoet @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating I wasn't alive for the 1918 pandemic. I was alive for the AIDS crisis in the 80's. My expectations of how deadly pandemics play out are shaped by that. Right now we're a bit more than 2 years in to the recognition of COVID-19 as a distinct illness, which in an AIDS timeline...

@Too_Big_To_Fail @FenitN @brooklynmarie @dtkeating What? Why would you assume that? *Smallpox* didn't have 100% mortality. 

Have you ever seen what the mortality rate of the 1918 Flu was?
@FenitN @dtkeating might want to actually read the study. that percentage DOES NOT INCLUDE VACCINATED PEOPLE. https://t.co/B0acaDvCMf
